verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There is none like You. No one else can touch my heart like You do. I could search for all eternity, Lord And findâ€”there is none like You! (repeat){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Your majesty flows like a river wide And healing comes from Your hands. Suffering children are safe in Your arms. There is none like You!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I could search for all eternity long There is none, Lord. There is none, Lord. There is none like You!{/lang-eng}
